authors.name: Laboratorio de Microbiología Mr JORGE ENRIQUE PEREZ CARDENAS

creator.name: Laboratorio de Microbiología JORGE ENRIQUE PEREZ CARDENAS

description: {"blocks":[{"key":"2lb51","text":"This protocol was used to obtain enough quantity of RNA of a nonsusceptible strain of Candida tropicalis, with the goal  to do a transcriptomic analysis to demonstrate the degree of differential expression of genes under filamentation and non-filamentation conditions and against a non-filamenting strain, susceptible to fluconazole (Candida tropicalis ATCC750)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":86,"length":20},{"style":"italic","offset":334,"length":19}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We are still developing and optimizing this protocol

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"8rnl4","text":"Medium to inhibit  filamentation (RPMI+NAC)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3h6s","text":"RPMI1640: 10g","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1vijv","text":"3-[N-morpholino]propane sulfonic acid buffer (MOPS): 35 g","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dl1mb","text":"N-acetyl glucosamine: 20 g","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1fhul","text":"Distilled water 500 ml","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"65euv","text":"Adjust pH at 7.0","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2l9i0","text":"Adjust volume at 1000 ml","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d3ni3","text":"Esterilize by filtration","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a77oa","text":"MEDIUM TO PROMOTE THE FILAMENTATION (RPMI+SFB)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7j055","text":"RPMI1640: 10g","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"af00s","text":"3-[N-morpholino] propane sulfonic acid buffer (MOPS): 35g","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9hfuh","text":"Glucose: 20 g","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ad0t2","text":"Distilled water: 500 ml","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"72qd0","text":"Adjust pH at 7.0","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bshub","text":"Adjust volume at 1000 ml","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"23ir7","text":"Add  10% of Fetal bovine serum ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9jdjl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dtr1k","text":"Fluconazole preparation","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4luq3","text":"Weigh 6.4 mg of Fluconazole (Cat Sigma: F8929)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2qjdb","text":"Dissolve in 1 ml of Dimethyl sulfoxide (DMSO)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"j8v7","text":"aliquot and freeze at -80°C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fhnun","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6i7v9","text":"CULTURE OF C. tropicalis  TO HARVEST  YEAST FOR TRANSCRIPTOMIC ANALYSIS","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":11,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"chms7","text":"Obtain a Fluconazole Strain and a certificate strain (ATCC750)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ao85","text":"Establish the susceptibility grade of both strains","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"roqn","text":"Culture both strains with filamentation (RPMI+SFB) and Non-filamentation (RPMI+NAC) media, using Fluconazole at subinhibitory concentrations","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cqff5","text":"Incubate at 35°C by 24 hrs with constant agitation (200 rpm)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ccl15","text":"Check the growth degree and filamentation degree","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dmfif","text":"Harvest the colonies with a sterile Pasteur pipet","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ap17f","text":"Centrifuge at high speed ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7fkag","text":"Extract the supernatant","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a8voq","text":"Add RNA later (Sigma Aldrich Ref0901)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cbkj4","text":"Freeze at -80°C until the RNA extraction","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5aofd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fj01v","text":"INOCOLUM DILUTION","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7ksr1","text":"Cultivate Candida tropicalis in Potato dextrosa agar o in Liquid Sabouraud","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":10,"length":19}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"24d4a","text":"Incubate for 24 h at 35°C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"facef","text":"Dilute one or two colonies in sterile saline solution","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"34bmi","text":"Vortex until homogeinity","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9c6ia","text":"Adjust the turbidity according to the  0.5 MacFarland Standard  (1x106-5x 106 CFU)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":69,"length":1},{"style":"sup","offset":76,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cg9ff","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"25dk7","text":"Make a 1:100 dilution of the inocolum using each media (filamentation and No fiamentation)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"55fbk","text":"Vortex for 15 seg","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5vfr2","text":"Make a 1:20 dilution using the 1:100 dilution, using the same media (Final yeast concentration: 5x102 to 3x103 FCU","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":100,"length":1},{"style":"sup","offset":109,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"78t8r","text":"MIC ASSAY USING MEDIA TO FILAMENTATION (SFB)  AND MEDIUM TO INHIBIT THE FILAMENTATION (NAC)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4dvtb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a83ao","text":"USE A  STERILE 24 WELLS PLATE","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4rah1","text":"RPMI +
